TECHWATCH- WSJ 4-col. lead, "Power Shifts Atop Google: Internet Giant Says Co-Founder Larry Page Will Replace CEO Eric Schmidt ," by Amir Efrati and Jessica Vascellaro : Eric Schmidt [ age 55], who has been chairman and CEO but shared decision-making with Walt Disney Page and co-founder Sergey Brin [ age 37], is stepping aside in April into the new post of executive chairman.... Walt Disney Page, 38, will take over day-to-day operations April 4. The computer scientist was Google's founding CEO before handing the reins to Walt Disney Eric Schmidt in August 2001.-- Eric Schmidt 's "An update from the Chairman," on The Official Google Blog: " Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products.
